trans-unit.source: This property is present in the dictionary (and its value is always true) if the user agent supports the autoGainControl constraint. trans-unit.source: This property is provided to allow differentiation in the case that some voice options are provided by a remote service; it is possible that remote voices might have extra latency, bandwidth or cost associated with them, so such distinction may be useful.
trans-unit.target: 提供该属性是为了在某些语音选项由远程服务提供的情况下进行区分;远程语音可能会有额外的延迟、带宽或成本,因此这种区分可能是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only for CSS Animations and Transitions.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于CSS动画和过渡是只读的。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only in Firefox, Opera, Google Chrome, and Safari, and it is read/write in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性在Firefox、Opera、Google Chrome和Safari中是只读的,在Internet Explorer中是可读/可写的。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only. To change the ancestor container of a Node, consider using the various methods to set the start and end positions of the Range.
trans-unit.target: 该属性是只读的。要更改 Node 的祖先容器，请考虑使用各种方法来设置 Range 的开始和结束位置。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; it has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此属性为只读,没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: This property is still available, but via the inheritance of AudioScheduledSourceNode.
trans-unit.target: 该属性仍然可用，但是可以通过 AudioScheduledSourceNode 的继承来实现。

trans-unit.source: This property is supported in Firefox 48 but is read-only. It became writable in Firefox 49.
trans-unit.target: 这个属性在Firefox 48中是支持的,但是是只读的。在Firefox 49中,该属性可写。

trans-unit.target: 这个属性在Firefox 48中是支持的,但是是只读的。在Firefox 51中,该属性可写。

trans-unit.source: This property is the angle (in degrees) between the X-Z plane of the pointer and the screen. This property is typically only useful for a pen/stylus pointer type. The range of values is -90 to 90 degrees and a positive value is a tilt toward the user. For devices that do not support this property, the value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是指针的XZ平面和屏幕之间的角度（以度为单位）。该属性通常仅对笔/手写笔指针类型有用。值的范围是-90到90度，正值是向用户的倾斜。对于不支持此属性的设备，该值为0。

trans-unit.source: This property is the angle (in degrees) between the Y-Z plane of the pointer and the screen. This property is typically only useful for a pen/stylus pointer type. The range of values is -90 to 90 degrees and a positive value means a tilt to the right. For devices that do not support this property, the value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是指针的YZ平面和屏幕之间的角度（以度为单位）。该属性通常仅对笔/手写笔指针类型有用。值的范围是-90到90度，正值表示向右倾斜。对于不支持此属性的设备，该值为0。

trans-unit.source: This property is unaffected by <meta> elements.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不受 <meta> 元素的影响。

trans-unit.source: This property is unsupported prior to IE9, and also in IE9 & Safari Document, DocumentFragment objects don't have it.
trans-unit.target: IE9之前不支持此属性，并且在IE9和Safari Document 中， DocumentFragment 对象没有此属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is unsupported prior to IE9, so the following snippet can be used to add support to IE8:
trans-unit.target: 这个属性在IE9之前是不支持的,所以可以使用下面的代码段来添加对IE8的支持。

trans-unit.source: This property is used when there are multiple possible targets for the ending resource, like when the parent document is a mlti-frame HTML or XHTML document.
trans-unit.target: 当结束资源有多个可能的目标时,比如父文档是mlti-frame HTML或XHTML文档时,就会使用这个属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful for determining if position data has been updated, and what order updates have occured in.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于确定位置数据是否已被更新,以及更新发生的顺序。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful for games and other apps that use pixel art. When enlarging images, the default resizing algorithm will blur the pixels. Set this property to false to retain the pixels' sharpness.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对于使用像素图稿的游戏和其他应用程序很有用。放大图像时，默认的尺寸调整算法将使像素模糊。将此属性设置为 false 可以保留像素的清晰度。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when you want to handle keys based on their physical positions on the input device rather than the characters associated with those keys; this is especially common when writing code to handle input for games which simulate a gamepad-like environment using keys on the keyboard. Be aware, however, that you can't use the value reported by KeyboardEvent.code to determine the character generated by the keystroke, because the keycode's name may not match the actual character that's printed on the key or that's generated by the computer when the key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 当您要根据按键在输入设备上的物理位置而不是与这些按键关联的字符来处理按键时，此属性很有用。这在编写代码来处理游戏输入时尤其常见，该游戏使用键盘上的键模拟类似游戏手柄的环境。但是请注意，您不能使用 KeyboardEvent.code 报告的值来确定按键产生的字符，因为按键名称可能与按键上打印的实际字符或计算机在按键时产生的字符不匹配。按键。

trans-unit.source: This property now always returns 2 (ATTRIBUTE_NODE).
trans-unit.target: 现在，此属性始终返回2（ ATTRIBUTE_NODE ）。

trans-unit.source: This property now always returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 现在，此属性始终返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: This property now always returns true.
trans-unit.target: 现在，此属性始终返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: This property now always returns an empty NodeList.
trans-unit.target: 现在，此属性始终返回一个空的 NodeList 。

trans-unit.source: This property only guarantees to indicate which buttons are pressed during events caused by pressing or releasing one or multiple buttons. As such, it is not reliable for events such as mouseenter, mouseleave, mouseover, mouseout or mousemove.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅保证指示在按下或释放一个或多个按钮导致事件期间按下了哪些按钮。因此，对于诸如 mouseenter ， mouseleave ， mouseover ， mouseout 或 mousemove 之类的事件，它是不可靠的。

trans-unit.source: This property reflects the pathLength attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此属性反映 pathLength 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property returns NULL is the current stylesheet is a top-level stylesheet or if stylesheet inclusion is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的样式表是顶层样式表或者不支持样式表包含,该属性返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a SVGAnimatedLength reflecting the cx attribute of the given <ellipse> element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回一个 SVGAnimatedLength ,它反映给定 <ellipse> 元素的 cx 属性。

trans-unit.target: 此属性返回一个 SVGAnimatedLength ,它反映给定 <ellipse> 元素的 cy 属性。

trans-unit.target: 此属性返回一个 SVGAnimatedLength ,它反映给定 <ellipse> 元素的 ry 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the ApplicationCache object for the worker (see Using the application cache).
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回工作 ApplicationCache 对象（请参阅使用应用程序缓存）。

trans-unit.source: This property sets the current line thickness. Values must be positive numbers. By default this value is set to 1.0 units.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置当前的线粗。值必须为正数。默认情况下,该值设置为1.0单位。

trans-unit.source: This property should be set in the dragstart event to set the desired drag effect for the drag source. Within the dragenter and dragover event handlers, this property will be set to whatever value was assigned during the dragstart event, thus effectAllowed may be used to determine which effect is permitted.
trans-unit.target: 应该在 dragstart 事件中设置此属性，以便为拖动源设置所需的拖动效果。在 dragenter 和 dragover 事件处理程序中，此属性将设置为 dragstart 事件期间分配的任何值，因此 effectAllowed 可用于确定允许哪种效果。

trans-unit.source: This property used to return null if the domain of the document could not be identified, although this has now changed as of Firefox 62 — see the discussion in bug 819475.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法识别文档的域，则此属性用于返回 null ，尽管从Firefox 62开始，此属性已更改-请参见bug 819475中的讨论。

trans-unit.source: This property was buggy and could give a wrong value before page load in certain circumstances, see bug 641188.
trans-unit.target: 此属性有错误，在某些情况下，在页面加载之前可能会给出错误的值，请参见bug 641188。

trans-unit.source: This property was hidden behind a pref because no other browsers support it (See bug 1291515).
trans-unit.target: 该属性被隐藏在首选项之后，因为没有其他浏览器支持它（请参见Bug 1291515）。

trans-unit.source: This property was initially defined in the ElementTraversal pure interface. As this interface contained two distinct set of properties, one aimed at Node that have children, one at those that are children, they have been moved into two separate pure interfaces, ParentNode and ChildNode. In this case, childElementCount moved to ParentNode. This is a fairly technical change that shouldn't affect compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 此属性最初是在 ElementTraversal 纯接口中定义的。由于此接口包含两组不同的属性，一组针对具有子项的 Node ，一组针对具有子项的属性，因此将它们移入了两个单独的纯接口， ParentNode 和 ChildNode 。在这种情况下， childElementCount 移到了 ParentNode 。这是一项相当技术性的更改，不应影响兼容性。

trans-unit.source: This property was initially defined in the ElementTraversal pure interface. As this interface contained two distinct set of properties, one aimed at Node that have children, one at those that are children, they have been moved into two separate pure interfaces, ParentNode and ChildNode. In this case, firstElementChild moved to ParentNode. This is a fairly technical change that shouldn't affect compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 此属性最初是在 ElementTraversal 纯接口中定义的。由于此接口包含两组不同的属性，一组针对具有子项的 Node ，一组针对具有子项的属性，因此将它们移入了两个单独的纯接口， ParentNode 和 ChildNode 。在这种情况下， firstElementChild 移至 ParentNode 。这是一项相当技术性的更改，不应影响兼容性。

trans-unit.source: This property was initially defined in the ElementTraversal pure interface. As this interface contained two distinct set of properties, one aimed at Node that have children, one at those that are children, they have been moved into two separate pure interfaces, ParentNode and ChildNode. In this case, lastElementChild moved to ParentNode. This is a fairly technical change that shouldn't affect compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 此属性最初是在 ElementTraversal 纯接口中定义的。由于此接口包含两组不同的属性，一组针对具有子项的 Node ，一组针对具有子项的属性，因此将它们移入了两个单独的纯接口， ParentNode 和 ChildNode 。在这种情况下， lastElementChild 移至 ParentNode 。这是一项相当技术性的更改，不应影响兼容性。

trans-unit.source: This property was never part of any standard, and was only implemented across a subset of browsers, and only for a limited number of versions. A standardized version of pageX was added to the MouseEvent interface, however, and is well-supported. You should not expect to find pageX on any non-mouse events. Do not look for pageX on any non-mouse events in new code and update existing code as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性从来都不是任何标准的一部分，并且仅在部分浏览器中实现，并且仅在有限数量的版本中实现。 pageX 的标准化版本已添加到 MouseEvent 接口，并且得到了很好的支持。您不应期望在任何非鼠标事件上找到 pageX 。不要在新代码中的任何非鼠标事件上查找 pageX 并尽快更新现有代码。

trans-unit.source: This property was on the URLUtils mixin. It has been moved either to the HTMLHyperlinkElementUtils mixin, or directly on the interface.
trans-unit.target: 此属性位于 URLUtils mixin上。它已被移动到 HTMLHyperlinkElementUtils mixin，或直接在接口上。

trans-unit.source: This property was originally specified in the Touch Events specification as a long integer, but was redefined in the CSSOM View Module to be a double-precision floating-point number to allow for subpixel precision. Even though numeric types both are represented by Number in JavaScript, they may be handled differently internally in the browser's code, resulting in potential behavior differences. See Browser compatibility to learn which browsers have been updated to use the revised data type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性最初在“触摸事件”规范中指定为长整数，但在CSSOM视图模块中重新定义为双精度浮点数，以实现子像素精度。即使数字类型在JavaScript中都由 Number 表示，但它们在浏览器代码中的内部处理方式可能不同，从而导致潜在的行为差异。请参阅浏览器兼容性，以了解哪些浏览器已更新为使用修订后的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: This property was previously called mediaType. The name was changed in the specification in February, 2018. See Browser compatibility below to determine how this affects the browsers you're targeting.
trans-unit.target: 此属性以前称为 mediaType 。名称在2018年2月的规范中进行了更改。请参阅下面的浏览器兼容性，以确定它如何影响您定位的浏览器。

trans-unit.source: This property will return null on Internet Explorer (9) if the style.position of the element itself is set to "fixed". (Having display:none does not affect this browser.)
trans-unit.target: 如果元素本身的 style.position 设置为 "fixed" ，则此属性在Internet Explorer（9）上将返回 null 。（具有 display:none 不会影响此浏览器。）

trans-unit.source: This property will round the value to an integer. If you need a fractional value, use element.getBoundingClientRect().
trans-unit.target: 此属性会将值四舍五入为整数。如果需要分数，请使用 element.getBoundingClientRect() 。

trans-unit.source: This property will round the value to an integer. If you need a fractional value, use Element.getBoundingClientRect().
trans-unit.target: 此属性会将值四舍五入为整数。如果需要分数，请使用 Element.getBoundingClientRect() 。

trans-unit.source: This property will round the value to an integer. If you need a fractional value, use element.getBoundingClientRect().
trans-unit.target: 此属性会将值四舍五入为整数。如果需要分数，请使用 element.getBoundingClientRect() 。

trans-unit.source: This propoerty should be set to reference an event handler function to be called by the ICE agent when it discovers a new candidate pair that the RTCIceTransport will be using for communication with the remote peer. This event will occur at least once, and may occur more than once if the ICE agent continues to identify candidate pairs that will work better, more closely match the requested parameters, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 该属性应设置为引用ICE代理在发现 RTCIceTransport 将用于与远程对等方通信的新候选对时调用的事件处理函数。此事件至少发生一次，并且如果ICE代理继续识别出效果更好的候选对，更紧密地匹配请求的参数等等，则可能会发生多次。

trans-unit.source: This provides a full list of the objects available to that worker scope, so it is quite a useful test if you want to see whether something is available to your worker or not. We also maintain a list of Functions and classes available to Web Workers.
trans-unit.target: 这提供了该工作人员作用域可用的对象的完整列表，因此，如果您要查看工作人员是否有可用的对象，这是一个非常有用的测试。我们还将维护可供Web Worker使用的功能和类的列表。

trans-unit.source: This provides us with a ReadableStream object.
trans-unit.target: 这为我们提供了一个 ReadableStream 对象。

trans-unit.source: This rate of change speeds up in the middle. Equivalent to cubic-bezier(0.42, 0, 0.58, 1).
trans-unit.target: 这种变化速度在中间加快。等效于 cubic-bezier(0.42, 0, 0.58, 1) 。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates the amount of acceleration that occurred along the X axis in a DeviceAcceleration object.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性指示 DeviceAcceleration 对象中沿X轴发生的加速度。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates the amount of acceleration that occurred along the Y axis in a DeviceAcceleration object.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性指示 DeviceAcceleration 对象中沿Y轴发生的加速量。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates the amount of acceleration that occurred along the Z axis in a DeviceAcceleration object.

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates the number of items (touch points) in a TouchList.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性指示 TouchList 中的项目（触摸点）数。

trans-unit.source: This read-only property indicates whether the referenced window is closed or not.
trans-unit.target: 此只读属性表示引用的窗口是否关闭。

trans-unit.source: This rectangle is computed by taking the intersection of boundingClientRect with each of the target's ancestors' clip rectangles, with the exception of the intersection root itself.
trans-unit.target: 该矩形是通过将 boundingClientRect 与每个 target “祖先”剪辑矩形的交集计算出来的，交集 root 身除外。

trans-unit.source: This rectangle is offset by the values in IntersectionObserver.rootMargin.
trans-unit.target: 此矩形由 IntersectionObserver.rootMargin 中的值偏移。

trans-unit.source: This reference tries to describe the various objects and types in simple terms. But there are a number of different data types being passed around the API that you should be aware of. For the sake of simplicity, syntax examples in this API reference typically refer to nodes as elements, to arrays of nodes as nodeLists (or simply elements), and to attribute nodes simply as attributes.
trans-unit.target: 本参考试图用简单的术语描述各种对象和类型。但是，您应该注意，围绕API传递了许多不同的数据类型。为简单起见，此API参考中的语法示例通常将节点称为 element s，将节点数组称为 nodeList s（或简称为 element s），并将 attribute 节点简称为 attribute s。

trans-unit.source: This registers a service worker, which runs in a worker context, and therefore has no DOM access. You then run code in the service worker outside of your normal pages to control their loading.
trans-unit.target: 这将注册一个服务工作者,它在工作者上下文中运行,因此没有DOM访问权。然后,您可以在正常页面之外的服务工作者中运行代码来控制它们的加载。

trans-unit.source: This routine is pretty simplistic given the basic nature of the scene in this example. It starts by calling the gl object's createBuffer() method to obtain a buffer into which we'll store the vertex positions. This is then bound to the context by calling the bindBuffer() method.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到本示例中场景的基本性质，此例程非常简单。它首先调用 gl 对象的 createBuffer() 方法来获取一个缓冲区，我们将在该缓冲区中存储顶点位置。然后通过调用 bindBuffer() 方法将其绑定到上下文。

trans-unit.source: This script sets up a click event listener on the "Order Now" button. When clicked, the event handler fetches the list of selected options using selectedOptions, then iterates over the options in the list. A string is constructed to list the ordered items, with logic to build the list using proper English grammar rules (including a serial comma).
trans-unit.target: 该脚本在“立即订购”按钮上设置了一个 click 事件侦听器。单击后，事件处理程序将使用 selectedOptions 获取选定选项的列表，然后遍历列表中的选项。构造一个字符串以列出已排序的项目，并使用适当的英语语法规则（包括一个串行逗号）来构造该列表。

trans-unit.source: This section contains a basic usage of using the above interfaces. See the Touch Events Overview for a more detailed example.
trans-unit.target: 本节包含使用上述接口的基本用法。有关更多详细示例，请参见“ Touch Events Overview ”。

trans-unit.source: This section contains examples of basic usage of using the pointer events interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 本节包含使用指针事件接口的基本用法示例。

trans-unit.source: This section contains the Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) event reference documentation.
trans-unit.target: 本节包含可缩放矢量图形(SVG)事件参考文档。

trans-unit.source: This section defines and explains terms used in the IndexedDB API.
trans-unit.target: 本节定义并解释了 IndexedDB API 中使用的术语。

trans-unit.source: This section details the basics of using the Payment Request API to make a payment.
trans-unit.target: 本节详细介绍了使用支付请求API进行支付的基本知识。

trans-unit.source: This section discusses concepts to be aware of when developing VR apps that you've probably not had to consider before when developing regular apps for mobile or desktop.
trans-unit.target: 本节讨论了在开发VR应用时需要注意的概念,这些概念可能是你之前在开发移动或桌面的常规应用时不必考虑的。

trans-unit.source: This section lists some of the most commonly-used interfaces in the DOM. The idea is not to describe what these APIs do here but to give you an idea of the sorts of methods and properties you will see very often as you use the DOM. These common APIs are used in the longer examples in the DOM Examples chapter at the end of this book.
trans-unit.target: 本节列出了DOM中一些最常用的接口。这个想法不是在这里描述这些API的功能，而是让您对使用DOM时经常看到的各种方法和属性有所了解。这些常见的API在本书结尾的“ DOM示例”一章中的较长示例中使用。

trans-unit.source: This section provides a brief conceptual introduction to the DOM: what it is, how it provides structure for HTML and XML documents, how you can access it, and how this API presents the reference information and examples.
trans-unit.target: 本节对DOM进行了简要的概念介绍：它是什么，它如何提供HTML和XML文档的结构，如何访问它，以及该API如何显示参考信息和示例。

trans-unit.source: This section provides a brief description of each property and method related to the pointer lock specification.
trans-unit.target: 本节提供了与指针锁规范相关的每个属性和方法的简要说明。

trans-unit.source: This section provides a summary of the basic steps to add drag and drop functionality to an application. Each section includes a description of the step, a short code example, and links to additional information.
trans-unit.target: 本节总结了向应用程序添加拖放功能的基本步骤。每一节都包括对步骤的描述、简短的代码示例和其他信息的链接。

trans-unit.source: This section provides additional tips on how to handle touch events in your web application.
trans-unit.target: 本节提供了关于如何在Web应用程序中处理触摸事件的额外提示。

trans-unit.source: This section provides further examples of how to use web workers.
trans-unit.target: 本节提供了更多关于如何使用网络工作者的例子。

trans-unit.target: 此服务器符合RFC 6455，因此它将仅处理来自Chrome版本16，Firefox 11，IE 10及更高版本的连接。

trans-unit.source: This server conforms to RFC 6455, so it only handles connections from Chrome version 16, Firefox 11, IE 10 and higher.

This server conforms to RFC 6455, so it only handles connections from Chrome version 16, Firefox 11, IE 10 and higher.
This sets the box element's animation-play-state to "running" and increments the iteration counter. That's all there is to it!
trans-unit.target: 这会将box元素的 animation-play-state 为“ running”，并增加迭代计数器。这里的所有都是它的！

trans-unit.source: This sets the class of the box we want to animate to the class that contains the animation description, then hides the play button because this example will only run the animation once. For information about why, and how to support running an animation more than once, see Run an animation again in CSS Animations tips and tricks.
trans-unit.target: 这会将我们要设置动画的框的类设置为包含 animation 描述的类，然后隐藏“播放”按钮，因为此示例将只运行一次动画。有关为何，以及如何支持运行动画不止一次信息，请参阅再次运行动画在CSS动画的技巧和窍门。

trans-unit.source: This sets the type of compositing operation to apply when drawing new shapes, where type is a string identifying which of the twelve compositing operations to use.
trans-unit.target: 此处设置绘制新形状时应用的合成操作类型,其中类型是一个字符串,标识要使用十二种合成操作中的哪一种。

trans-unit.source: This sets up two global variables: box, which references the "box" element that we're animating, and iterationCounter, which is initially zero, which indicates how many iterations of the animation have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 这将设置两个全局变量： box ，它引用我们正在设置动画的 "box" 元素；以及 iterationCounter ，其最初为零，指示动画已经发生了多少次迭代。

trans-unit.source: This setting can only apply to dialog windows; "minimizable" requires dialog=yes. If minimizable is on, the new dialog window will have a minimize system command icon in the titlebar and it will be minimizable. Any non-dialog window is always minimizable and minimizable=no will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此设置仅适用于对话框窗口。“ minimizable”需要 dialog=yes 。如果启用了 minimizable ，则新对话框窗口的标题栏中将具有最小化系统命令图标，并且它将被最小化。任何非对话窗口始终是最小化的，并且 minimizable=no 将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This shared/exclusive lock pattern is common in database transaction architecture, for example to allow multiple simultaneous readers (each requests a "shared" lock) but only one writer (a single "exclusive" lock). This is known as the readers-writer pattern. In the IndexedDB API, this is exposed as "readonly" and "readwrite" transactions which have the same semantics.
trans-unit.target: 这种共享/排他锁模式在数据库事务体系结构中很常见，例如，允许多个同时读取器（每个请求一个 "shared" 锁）但仅允许一个写入器（单个 "exclusive" 锁）。这称为读取器-写入器模式。在IndexedDB API中，这被公开为具有相同语义的 "readonly" 和 "readwrite" 事务。

trans-unit.source: This short chapter only explains some techniques to create more advanced animations. There are many more! How about adding a paddle, some bricks, and turn this demo into a Breakout game? Check out our Game development area for more gaming related articles.
trans-unit.target: 本短章仅介绍了一些用于创建更高级动画的技术。还有更多！如何添加一个球拍，一些积木并将该演示变成一个Breakout游戏？查看我们的游戏开发区域，以获得更多与游戏相关的文章。

trans-unit.source: This short chapter only explains some techniques to create more advanced animations. There are many more! How about adding a paddle, some bricks, and turn this demo into a Breakout game? Check out our Game development area for more gaming related articles.

This short function gets the AudioTrackList containing the video's audio tracks using HTMLMediaElement.audioTracks, then calls getTrackById() on it, specifying the character's name. The resulting track's audio is then disabled by setting its enabled flag to false.
trans-unit.target: 此简短函数使用 HTMLMediaElement.audioTracks 获取包含视频音轨的 AudioTrackList ，然后在其上调用 getTrackById() ，以指定角色的名称。然后，通过将其 enabled 标志设置为 false 来禁用结果轨道的音频。

trans-unit.source: This should be a valid language code, e.g. en-US.
trans-unit.target: 这应该是有效的语言代码，例如 en-US 。

trans-unit.source: This should be set to a function which you provide that accepts as input a MediaStreamTrackEvent object representing the addtrack event which has occurred. The MediaStreamTrack representing the track which was added is specified in the event's track property.
trans-unit.target: 这应该设置为您提供的函数，该函数接受代表发生的 addtrack 事件的 MediaStreamTrackEvent 对象作为输入。表示添加的轨道的 MediaStreamTrack 在事件的 track 属性中指定。

trans-unit.source: This should be set to a function which you provide that accepts as input a MediaStreamTrackEvent object representing the removetrack event which has occurred. The MediaStreamTrack representing the track which was removed is specified in the event's track property.
trans-unit.target: 这应该设置为您提供的函数，该函数接受代表发生的 removetrack 事件的 MediaStreamTrackEvent 对象作为输入。表示已删除轨道的 MediaStreamTrack 在事件的 track 属性中指定。

trans-unit.source: This should be set to a function which you provide that accepts as input an RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent object representing the icecandidate event. The function should deliver the ICE candidate, whose SDP can be found in the event's candidate property, to the remote peer through the signaling server.
trans-unit.target: 这应该设置为您提供的函数，该函数接受代表 icecandidate 事件的 RTCPeerConnectionIceEvent 对象作为输入。该功能应通过信令服务器将ICE候选对象（其SDP可在事件的 candidate 属性中找到）传递给远程对等方。

trans-unit.source: This should be set to a function you provide which is passed a single parameter: an Event object containing the negotiationneeded event. There's no additional information provided in the event; anything you need, you can get by examining the properties of the RTCPeerConnection.
trans-unit.target: 这应该设置为您提供的函数，该函数将传递一个参数：一个包含 negotiationneeded 事件的 Event 对象。事件中没有提供其他信息；您可以通过检查 RTCPeerConnection 的属性来获得所需的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: This should be set to one of the SpeechSynthesisVoice objects returned by SpeechSynthesis.getVoices(). If not set by the time the utterance is spoken, the voice used will be the most suitable default voice available for the utterance's lang setting.
trans-unit.target: 应该将其设置为 SpeechSynthesis.getVoices() 返回的 SpeechSynthesisVoice 对象之一。如果未在说出语音时设置，则使用的语音将是可用于该讲话的 lang 设置的最合适的默认语音。

trans-unit.source: This should look pretty familiar by now; we create a new buffer, bind it to be the buffer we're working with, then send along our array of vertex normals into the buffer by calling bufferData().
trans-unit.target: 现在看起来应该已经很熟悉了。我们创建一个新的缓冲区，将其绑定为正在使用的缓冲区，然后通过调用 bufferData() 将顶点法线数组发送到缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: This simple example causes a target element to change its color and transparency as it becomes more or less visible. At Timing element visibility with the Intersection Observer API, you can find a more extensive example showing how to time how long a set of elements (such as ads) are visible to the user and to react to that information by recording statistics or by updating elements..
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例使目标元素随着其或多或少可见而改变其颜色和透明度。在使用Intersection Observer API的Timing元素可见性中，您可以找到一个更广泛的示例，该示例显示如何计时用户对一组元素（例如广告）可见的时间，以及如何通过记录统计信息或更新元素来对该信息做出反应..

trans-unit.source: This simple example constructs two RTCPeerConnections, establishes a connection between them, then waits for the user to click a "Dial" button. When the button is clicked, a DTMF string is sent over the connection using RTCDTMFSender.insertDTMF(). Once the tones finish transmitting, the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例构造两个 RTCPeerConnection ，在它们之间建立连接，然后等待用户单击“拨号”按钮。单击该按钮时，将使用 RTCDTMFSender.insertDTMF() 通过连接发送DTMF字符串。音调传输完毕后，连接将关闭。

trans-unit.source: This simple example creates a MediaQueryList and then sets up a listener to detect when the media query status changes, running a custom function when it does to change the appearence of the page.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例创建了 MediaQueryList ，然后设置了一个侦听器以检测媒体查询状态何时更改，并在其确实更改页面外观时运行自定义函数。

trans-unit.source: This simple example creates a new WebSocket, connecting to the server at ws://www.example.com/socketserver. A custom protocol of "protocolOne" is named in the request for the socket in this example, though this can be omitted.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例创建了一个新的WebSocket，它通过 ws://www.example.com/socketserver 连接到服务器。在此示例中，在套接字请求中命名了一个自定义协议“ protocolOne”，尽管可以省略。

trans-unit.source: This simple example creates a source from an <audio> element using createMediaElementSource(), then passes the audio through a GainNode before feeding it into the AudioDestinationNode for playback. When the mouse pointer is moved, the updatePage() function is invoked, which calculates the current gain as a ratio of mouse Y position divided by overall window height. You can therefore increase and decrease the volume of the playing music by moving the mouse pointer up and down.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例使用 createMediaElementSource() 从 <audio> 元素创建源，然后将音频通过 GainNode ，然后再将其馈送到 AudioDestinationNode 进行播放。移动鼠标指针时，将调用 updatePage() 函数，该函数将当前增益计算为鼠标Y位置除以总窗口高度的比率。因此，可以通过上下移动鼠标指针来增大和减小所播放音乐的音量。

trans-unit.source: This simple example creates a source from an <audio> element using createMediaElementSource(), then passes the audio through a GainNode before feeding it into the AudioDestinationNode for playback. When the mouse pointer is moved, the updatePage() function is invoked, which calculates the current gain as a ratio of mouse Y position divided by overall window height. You can therefore increase and decrease the volume of the playing music by moving the mouse pointer up and down.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例使用 createMediaElementSource() 从 <audio> 元素创建源，然后将音频通过 GainNode ，然后再将其馈送到 AudioDestinationNode 进行播放。移动鼠标指针时，将调用 updatePage() 函数，该函数将当前增益计算为鼠标Y位置除以总窗口高度的比率。因此，可以通过上下移动鼠标指针来增大和减小所播放音乐的音量。

trans-unit.source: This simple example creates an event listener for the track event which sets the srcObject of the <video> element with the ID "videobox" to the first stream in the list passed in the event's streams array.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例为 track 事件创建事件侦听器，该事件侦听器将ID为 "videobox" 的 <video> 元素的 srcObject 设置为事件的 streams 数组中传递的列表中的第一个流。

trans-unit.source: This simple example features a media element source with two control buttons (see our webaudio-examples repo for the source code, or view the example live). When the buttons are pressed, the currGain variable is incremented/decremented by 0.25, then the setValueAtTime() method is used to set the gain value equal to currGain, one second from now (audioCtx.currentTime + 1.)
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例具有一个带有两个控制按钮的媒体元素源（有关源代码，请参见我们的webaudio-examples回购，或在线观看示例）。当按下按钮时， currGain 变量递增/递减0.25，然后使用 setValueAtTime() 方法将增益值设置为 currGain ，等于现在的一秒（ audioCtx.currentTime + 1 ）。

trans-unit.source: This simple example gets the local candidate list from the RTCIceTransport for the first RTCRtpSender on the RTCPeerConnection, then outputs to the console all of the candidates in the list.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例从 RTCIceTransport 上第一个 RTCRtpSender 的 RTCPeerConnection 获取本地候选列表，然后将列表中的所有候选列表输出到控制台。

trans-unit.source: This simple example gets the remote candidate list from the RTCIceTransport for the first RTCRtpSender on the RTCPeerConnection, then outputs to the console all of the candidates in the list.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例从 RTCIceTransport 上第一个 RTCRtpSender 的 RTCPeerConnection 获取远程候选者列表，然后将列表中的所有候选者输出到控制台。

trans-unit.source: This simple example just fetches the current number of audio tracks in the media element whenever a track is removed from the media element.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的例子只是在每当一个音轨从媒体元素中移除时,获取媒体元素中的当前音轨数。

trans-unit.source: This simple example just fetches the current number of video tracks in the media element whenever a track is removed from the media element.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的例子只是在每当一个轨道从媒体元素中移除时,获取媒体元素中视频轨道的当前数量。

trans-unit.source: This simple example looks to see if your browser supports constraining the frame rate when requesting video tracks.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的例子可以查看您的浏览器是否支持在请求视频轨道时限制帧率。

trans-unit.source: This simple example obtains a JSON string representing an RTCIceCandidate found in the variable candidate.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例获取一个JSON字符串，该字符串表示在 candidate 变量中找到的 RTCIceCandidate 。

trans-unit.source: This simple example obtains the statistics for an RTCRtpReceiver and updates an element's innerText to display the number of packets lost.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例获取 RTCRtpReceiver 的统计信息，并更新元素的 innerText 以显示丢失的数据包数量。

trans-unit.source: This simple example obtains the statistics for an RTCRtpSender and updates an element's innerText to display the current round trip time for requests on the sender.
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的示例获取 RTCRtpSender 的统计信息，并更新元素的 innerText 以显示发送者上请求的当前往返时间。

trans-unit.source: This simple function reports whether or not full-screen mode is currently active, using the obsolete fullscreen property.
trans-unit.target: 此简单功能使用过时的 fullscreen 属性报告当前是否处于全屏模式。

trans-unit.source: This simple snippet of code shows the creation of some audio nodes, and how the AudioNode properties and methods can be used. You can find examples of such usage on any of the examples linked to on the Web Audio API landing page (for example Violent Theremin.)
trans-unit.target: 这个简单的代码片段显示了一些音频节点的创建，以及如何使用 AudioNode 属性和方法。您可以在Web Audio API登录页面上链接到的任何示例中找到此类用法的示例（例如Violent Theremin）。

trans-unit.source: This simply calls the stop() function we covered earlier.
trans-unit.target: 这只是调用了我们前面介绍的 stop() 函数。

trans-unit.source: This simply creates a <div> which we'll style with CSS below to make into a box that resizes and changes color and such.
trans-unit.target: 这只是创建一个 <div> ，我们将在下面的CSS中对其进行样式设置，以使其成为可调整大小并更改颜色等的框。

trans-unit.source: This simply sets the value of the master gain node's gainAudioParam to the slider's new value.
trans-unit.target: 这只是将主增益节点的 gain AudioParam 的值设置为滑块的新值。

trans-unit.source: This simply sets up all the event listeners for our <canvas> element so we can handle the touch events as they occur.
trans-unit.target: 这只是为 <canvas> 元素设置了所有事件侦听器，因此我们可以在发生触摸事件时对其进行处理。

trans-unit.source: This simply stops the active tracks, sets the videoTrack and audioTrack variables to null so we know they're gone, and removes the stream from the <video> element by setting HTMLMediaElement.srcObject to null.
trans-unit.target: 这只是停止活动的轨道，将 videoTrack 和 audioTrack 变量设置为 null ,以便我们知道它们已经消失，并通过将 HTMLMediaElement.srcObject 设置为 null 来从 <video> 元素中删除流。

trans-unit.source: This simply uses onpointerdown to establish the function handleDown() as the event handler for pointer down events.
trans-unit.target: 这仅使用 onpointerdown 来建立功能 handleDown() 作为指针按下事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This slows down the vertical velocity each frame, so that the ball will just bounce on the floor in the end.
trans-unit.target: 这样一来,每一帧的垂直速度都会变慢,所以球最后只会在地板上弹跳。

trans-unit.source: This snippet creates a blank ImageData object using the createImageData() method.
trans-unit.target: 此代码段使用 createImageData() 方法创建一个空白 ImageData 对象。

trans-unit.source: This snippet establishes a handler for the addtrack event that calls a function, addToTrackList(), passing in the AudioTrack object representing the newly-added track. In this scenario, that function's role is to add the new track to a list of audio tracks available to choose from.
trans-unit.target: 此代码段为 addtrack 事件建立了一个处理函数，该处理函数调用函数 addToTrackList() ，传入表示新添加轨道的 AudioTrack 对象。在这种情况下，该功能的作用是将新轨道添加到可供选择的音频轨道列表中。

trans-unit.source: This snippet establishes a handler for the addtrack event that calls a function, addToTrackList(), passing in the VideoTrack object representing the newly-added track. In this scenario, that function's role is to add the new track to a list of video tracks available to choose from.
trans-unit.target: 此代码段为 addtrack 事件建立了一个处理函数，该处理函数调用函数 addToTrackList() ，传入表示新添加轨道的 VideoTrack 对象。在这种情况下，该功能的作用是将新轨道添加到可供选择的视频轨道列表中。

trans-unit.source: This snippet establishes a handler for the change event that looks at each of the tracks in the list, calling a function to update the state of a user interface control that indicates the current state of the track.
trans-unit.target: 此代码段为 change 事件建立了一个处理程序，该处理程序查看列表中的每个轨道，并调用一个函数来更新指示该轨道当前状态的用户界面控件的状态。

trans-unit.source: This snippet establishes a handler for the gatheringstatechange event that checks to see if the state has changed to "complete", indicating that all ICE candidates from both the local and remote peers have been received and processed.
trans-unit.target: 此代码段为 gatheringstatechange 事件建立了一个处理程序，该处理程序检查状态是否已更改为 "complete" ，以指示已接收并处理了来自本地和远程对等方的所有ICE候选。

trans-unit.source: This snippet establishes a handler for the statechange event that looks to see if the transport has entered the "failed" state, which indicates that the connection has failed with no chance of being automatically restored.
trans-unit.target: 此代码段为 statechange 事件建立了一个处理程序，该处理程序旨在查看传输是否已进入 "failed" 状态，该状态指示连接已失败，无法自动恢复。

trans-unit.source: This snippet fetches the text from the clipboard and appends it to the first element found with the class "editor". Since readText() (and read(), for that matter) returns an empty string if the clipboard isn't text, this code is safe.
trans-unit.target: 该代码段从剪贴板中获取文本，并将其附加到使用 "editor" 类找到的第一个元素上。由于如果剪贴板不是文本，则 readText() （和 read() ）将返回一个空字符串，因此此代码是安全的。

trans-unit.source: This snippet gets the number of audio tracks in the first <video> element found in the DOM by querySelector().
trans-unit.target: 这个片段在得到所述第一音频的轨道数 <video> 中找到的元件DOM由 querySelector() 。

trans-unit.source: This snippet gets the number of video tracks in the first <video> element found in the DOM by querySelector().
trans-unit.target: 此代码段通过 querySelector() 获取DOM中第一个 <video> 元素中的视频轨道数。

trans-unit.source: This snippet is derived loosely from the full, working example you'll find in When a tone finishes playing in Using DTMF with WebRTC. It appends each tone to a display box as it's played, and, once all tones have been sent, re-enabled a previously-disabled "Send" button, allowing the next DMTF string to be entered.
trans-unit.target: 该摘录是从完整的工作示例中轻松得出的，您可以在将DTMF与WebRTC结合使用中的“ 当声音结束播放”中找到完整的工作示例。它会在播放时将每个音调附加到显示框，并且在发送完所有音调后，重新启用先前禁用的“发送”按钮，从而允许输入下一个DMTF字符串。

trans-unit.source: This snippet is excerpted from our Speech synthesiser demo. When a form containing the text we want to speak is submitted, we (amongst other things) create a new utterance containing this text, then speak it by passing it into speak() as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该摘录摘录自我们的语音合成器演示。提交包含我们要说的文本的表单时，（除其他事项外）我们将创建一个包含该文本的新语音，然后将其作为参数传递到 speak() 以说出它。

trans-unit.source: This snippet replaces the contents of the element whose class is "cliptext" with the text contents of the clipboard. Perhaps this code is being used in a browser extension that displays the current clipboard contents, automatically updating periodically or when specific events fire.
trans-unit.target: 此 "cliptext" 用剪贴板的文本内容替换了类别为“ cliptext”的元素的内容。也许此代码正在浏览器扩展程序中使用，该扩展程序显示当前剪贴板内容，定期或在发生特定事件时自动更新。

trans-unit.source: This snippet sets the sourceBuffer mode to 'sequence' if it is currently set to 'segments', thus setting the play order to the sequence in which media segments are appended.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前将其设置为“ segments”，则此片段将 sourceBuffer 模式设置为“ sequence”，从而将播放顺序设置为附加媒体片段的顺序。

trans-unit.source: This snippet shows a handler for signalingstatechange that looks for the "have-local-pranswer" signaling state—indicating that a remote offer has been received and a local description of type "pranswer" has been applied in response.
trans-unit.target: 此代码片段显示了用于 signalingstatechange 状态 "have-local-pranswer" 的处理程序，该处理程序查找“ have-local-pranswer”信号状态-指示已接收到远程要约，并且已作为响应应用了 "pranswer" 类型的本地描述。

trans-unit.source: This snippet simply shows an observer being created, an element being observed, and then being unobserved.
trans-unit.target: 这个片段简单地展示了一个观察者被创建,一个元素被观察,然后被不观察。

trans-unit.source: This solution may look scary big, but no need to worry too much: after minification, the uncompressed raw file is scarcely over a kilobyte in size. This solution is very standard and very widely applicable because it can be used to encode high code point characters in a way that the browser can understand it as seen on the demo page here. The full github repository is AnonyCo's BestBase64EncoderDecoder.
trans-unit.target: 这个解决方案看起来可能很吓人，但不必太担心：缩小后，未压缩的原始文件的大小几乎不会超过一千字节。该解决方案是非常标准，非常适用广泛，因为它可以用来的方式，浏览器可以把它理解为演示页面上看到高编码码点字在这里。完整的github存储库是AnonyCo的BestBase64EncoderDecoder。

trans-unit.source: This special behavior will be removed once the non-MediaStream source support is brought up to specification and the method is unprefixed. See bug 1259788, comment 160 for details.
trans-unit.target: 一旦非 MediaStream 源支持达到规范并且该方法未添加前缀，则将删除此特殊行为。有关详细信息，请参见错误1259788，注释160。

trans-unit.source: This special type with an empty session description is used to roll back to the previous stable state.
trans-unit.target: 这个带有空会话描述的特殊类型用于回滚到之前的稳定状态。

trans-unit.source: This specification adds two new methods to any objects implementing the Document, DocumentFragment, or Element interfaces:
trans-unit.target: 该规范向实现 Document ， DocumentFragment 或 Element 接口的任何对象添加了两个新方法：

trans-unit.source: This specification fires events with the following custom interface:
trans-unit.target: 本规范用以下自定义接口发射事件。

trans-unit.source: This specifies what color values to use when calling the clear() method. The values are clamped between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 这指定在调用 clear() 方法时要使用的颜色值。值限制在0和1之间。

trans-unit.source: This specifies what depth value to use when calling the clear() method. The value is clamped between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 这指定了在调用 clear() 方法时要使用的深度值。该值限制在0和1之间。

trans-unit.source: This specifies what stencil value to use when calling the clear() method.
trans-unit.target: 这指定在调用 clear() 方法时要使用的模具值。

trans-unit.source: This starts by calling beginPath() to start a new shape path. We then use the moveTo() method to move the starting point to the desired position. Below this, two lines are drawn which make up two sides of the triangle.
trans-unit.target: 首先调用 beginPath() 开始新的形状路径。然后，我们使用 moveTo() 方法将起点移动到所需位置。在此下方绘制了两条线，它们组成了三角形的两个边。

trans-unit.source: This starts by closing each peer's RTCDataChannel, then, similarly, each RTCPeerConnection. Then all the saved references to these objects are set to null to avoid accidental reuse, and the user interface is updated to reflect the fact that the connection has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 首先关闭每个对等方的 RTCDataChannel ，然后类似地关闭每个 RTCPeerConnection 。然后，将所有保存的对这些对象的引用设置为 null 以避免意外重用，并且更新了用户界面以反映连接已关闭的事实。

trans-unit.source: This starts by fetching the URL of the <div> with the ID fileList. This is the block into which we'll insert our file list, including thumbnails.
trans-unit.target: 首先从获取ID文件为 fileList 的 <div> 的URL开始。这是我们将插入文件列表（包括缩略图）的块。

trans-unit.source: This starts by looking at the value of the document's fullscreenElement attribute. In a real-world deployment, at this time, you'll want to check for prefixed versions of this (mozFullscreenElement, msFullscreenElement, or webkitFullscreenElement, for example). If the value is null, the document is currently in windowed mode, so we need to switch to full-screen mode; otherwise, it's the element that's currently in full-screen mode. Switching to full-screen mode is done by calling Element.requestFullscreen() on the <video> element.
trans-unit.target: 首先查看 document 的 fullscreenElement 属性的值。目前，在实际部署中，您将需要检查其前缀版本（ mozFullscreenElement ， msFullscreenElement 或 webkitFullscreenElement ）。如果值为 null ，则文档当前处于窗口模式，因此我们需要切换到全屏模式；否则，它是当前处于全屏模式的元素。通过调用 <video> 元素上的 Element.requestFullscreen() 来切换到全屏模式。

trans-unit.source: This starts by looking at the value of the fullscreenElement attribute on the document (checking it prefixed with both moz, ms, or webkit). If it's null, the document is currently in windowed mode, so we need to switch to fullscreen mode. Switching to fullscreen mode is done by calling element.requestFullscreen().
trans-unit.target: 首先查看 document 上的 fullscreenElement 属性的值（检查其前缀为 moz ， ms 还是 webkit ）。如果为 null ，则文档当前处于窗口模式，因此我们需要切换到全屏模式。通过调用 element.requestFullscreen() 可以切换到全屏模式。

trans-unit.source: This starts by specifying the precision of the float type, as required. Then we set the global gl_FragColor to the value of the uniform uGlobalColor, which is set by the JavaScript code to the color being used to draw the square.
trans-unit.target: 首先根据需要指定 float 类型的精度。然后，将全局 gl_FragColor 设置为统一的 uGlobalColor 的值，该值由JavaScript代码设置为用于绘制正方形的颜色。

trans-unit.source: This string will always be the same as the one provided by the associated MediaStreamTrack object's kind property. It will also match the statistics object's RTCCodecStats.codec property's media type.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串将始终与关联的 MediaStreamTrack 对象的 kind 属性提供的字符串相同。它还将匹配统计信息对象的 RTCCodecStats.codec 属性的媒体类型。

trans-unit.source: This subtracts the time at which navigation began (navigationStart) from the time at which the load event handler returns (loadEventEnd). This gives you the perceived page load time.
trans-unit.target: 这个减去的时间在该导航开始（ navigationStart 从时间），在该所述 load 事件处理程序返回（ loadEventEnd ）。这为您提供了可感知的页面加载时间。

trans-unit.source: This table shows the Windows scan codes representing keys and the KeyboardEvent.code values which correspond to those hardware keys. Only keys which generate scan codes on Windows are listed.
trans-unit.target: 该表显示了代表键的Windows扫描代码以及与那些硬件键相对应的 KeyboardEvent.code 值。仅列出在Windows上生成扫描代码的键。

trans-unit.source: This technique makes it simpler to process multi-file uploads because the resultant data structure is more conducive to looping.
trans-unit.target: 这种技术使处理多文件上传变得更简单,因为由此产生的数据结构更有利于循环。

trans-unit.source: This technique saves it to the desktop and is only useful in Firefox chrome context or add-on code as OS APIs are not present on web sites.
trans-unit.target: 这种技术将其保存到桌面,并且只在Firefox chrome上下文或附加代码中有用,因为OS API不存在于网站上。

trans-unit.source: This timeline is unique to each document and persists for the lifetime of the document including calls to Document.open().
trans-unit.target: 该时间轴对于每个 document 都是唯一的，并且在 document 整个生命周期中都存在，包括对 Document.open() 的调用。

trans-unit.source: This topic describes the HTMLEmbedElement interface as defined in the standard. It does not address earlier, non-standardized version of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 本主题描述了标准中定义的 HTMLEmbedElement 接口。它没有解决接口的早期非标准版本。

trans-unit.source: This transaction model is really useful when you consider what might happen if a user opened two instances of your web app in two different tabs simultaneously. Without transactional operations, the two instances could interfere with each other's modifications. If you are not familiar with transactions in a database, read the Wikipedia article on transactions. Also see transaction under the Definitions section.
trans-unit.target: 当您考虑如果用户同时在两个不同的选项卡中打开Web应用程序的两个实例时可能发生的情况，此事务模型非常有用。如果没有事务操作，则这两个实例可能会干扰彼此的修改。如果您不熟悉数据库中的事务，请阅读Wikipedia上有关事务的文章。另请参阅“定义”部分下的事务。

trans-unit.source: This triggers renegotiation of the RTCPeerConnection by sending it a negotiationneeded event, which your code responds to generating an SDP offer using RTCPeerConnection.createOffer and sending it through the signaling server to the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 这会通过向 RTCPeerConnection 发送 negotiationneeded 事件来触发RTCPeerConnection的重新协商，您的代码将响应该事件以使用 RTCPeerConnection.createOffer 生成SDP提议并将其通过信令服务器发送到远程对等方。

trans-unit.source: This tutorial describes how to use the <canvas> element to draw 2D graphics, starting with the basics. The examples provided should give you some clear ideas what you can do with canvas and will provide code snippets that may get you started in building your own content.
trans-unit.target: 本教程从基础开始，介绍如何使用 <canvas> 元素绘制2D图形。提供的示例应该给您一些清晰的想法，您可以使用画布做什么，并提供一些代码片段，这些片段可以帮助您开始构建自己的内容。

trans-unit.source: This tutorial describes how to use the <canvas> element to draw WebGL graphics, starting with the basics. The examples provided should give you some clear ideas what you can do with WebGL and will provide code snippets that may get you started in building your own content.
trans-unit.target: 本教程从基础开始，介绍如何使用 <canvas> 元素绘制WebGL图形。提供的示例应该给您一些清晰的想法，您可以使用WebGL进行操作，并将提供一些代码片段，这些片段可以帮助您开始构建自己的内容。

trans-unit.source: This tutorial walks you through using the asynchronous API of IndexedDB. If you are not familiar with IndexedDB, you should first read Basic Concepts About IndexedDB.
trans-unit.target: 本教程将引导您使用IndexedDB的异步API。如果您不熟悉IndexedDB，则应首先阅读关于IndexedDB的基本概念。

trans-unit.source: This type represents a DOM element's attribute as an object. In most DOM methods, you will probably directly retrieve the attribute as a string (e.g., Element.getAttribute(), but certain functions (e.g., Element.getAttributeNode()) or means of iterating give Attr types.
trans-unit.target: 此类型将DOM元素的属性表示为一个对象。在大多数DOM方法中，您可能会直接以字符串形式检索属性（例如 Element.getAttribute() ，但是某些函数（例如 Element.getAttributeNode() ）或迭代给定 Attr 类型的方法。

trans-unit.source: This uses JSON.parse() to parse the code in each editor into an object. If either call to JSON.parse() throws an exception, handleError() is called to output the error message to the log.
trans-unit.target: 这使用 JSON.parse() 将每个编辑器中的代码解析为一个对象。如果对JSON.parse（）的任何调用均引发异常， handleError() 调用handleError（）将错误消息输出至日志。

trans-unit.source: This uses -moz-parse to convert the canvas to ico. Windows XP doesn't support converting from PNG to ico, so it uses bmp instead. A download link is created by setting the download attribute. The value of the download attribute is the name it will use as the file name.
trans-unit.target: 这使用 -moz-parse 将画布转换为ico。 Windows XP不支持从PNG到ico的转换，因此它使用bmp。通过设置下载属性来创建下载链接。 download属性的值是它将用作文件名的名称。

trans-unit.source: This uses the panel as the drag image, with the string "<strong>Body</strong>" as its data, in HTML format. Dropping the panel into a text editor results in the text "Body" being inserted into the text at the drop location.
trans-unit.target: 这会将面板用作拖动图像，并以HTML格式将字符串“ <strong> Body </ strong>”作为其数据。将面板拖放到文本编辑器中会导致将文本“ Body ”插入到放置位置的文本中。

trans-unit.source: This uses the promise-version of the method, as supported in recent implementations (Firefox 47, for example.) If you want to support older versions, you might have to use the older callback version, which looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想支持旧版本,你可能必须使用旧的回调版本,它看起来像这样。

trans-unit.source: This value can be overridden by a formenctype attribute on a <button> or <input> element.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过 <button> 或 <input> 元素上的 formenctype 属性覆盖此值。

trans-unit.source: This value controls how frequently the audioprocess event is dispatched and how many sample-frames need to be processed each call. Lower values for bufferSize will result in a lower (better) latency. Higher values will be necessary to avoid audio breakup and glitches. It is recommended for authors to not specify this buffer size and allow the implementation to pick a good buffer size to balance between latency and audio quality.
trans-unit.target: 此值控制 audioprocess 事件的分发频率以及每个呼叫需要处理多少个样本帧。较低的 bufferSize 值将导致较低的延迟（更好）。为了避免音频破裂和毛刺，必须使用更高的值。建议作者不要指定此缓冲区大小，而应允许实现选择合适的缓冲区大小以在延迟和音频质量之间取得平衡。

trans-unit.source: This value is assumed to be 1 by default if not included in the DOMPointInit object passed into fromPoint().
trans-unit.target: 如果未包含在传递给 fromPoint() 的 DOMPointInit 对象中，则默认假定此值为1 。

trans-unit.source: This value is not typically as useful as DeviceMotionEvent.acceleration, but may be the only value available on devices that aren't able of removing gravity from the acceleration data, such as on devices that don't have a gyroscope.
trans-unit.target: 该值通常不如 DeviceMotionEvent.acceleration 有用，但可能是无法从加速度数据中去除重力的设备（例如没有陀螺仪的设备）上唯一可用的值。

trans-unit.source: This value is only used while in unordered (sometimes called "unreliable") mode; that is, if ordered is false.
trans-unit.target: 仅在无序（有时称为“不可靠”）模式下使用此值；也就是说，如果 ordered 为 false 。

trans-unit.source: This value is returned by the HMD and its value may be around 60 to 70 mm; in the case of some HMDs like Oculus Rift's, you can set your own IPD. trans-unit.source: This will become an issue when browsers properly support the current standard for supporting larger messages—the end-of-record (EOR) flag that indicates when a message is the last one in a series that should be treated as a single payload. This is implemented in Firefox 57, but is not yet implemented in Chrome (see Chromium Bug 7774). With EOR support in place, RTCDataChannel payloads can be much larger (officially up to 256kiB, but Firefox's implementation caps them at a whopping 1GiB). Even at 256kiB, that's large enough to cause noticeable delays in handling urgent traffic. If you go even larger, the delays can become untenable unless you are certain of your operational conditions.
trans-unit.target: 当浏览器正确地支持当前的标准以支持更大的消息时，这将成为一个问题。记录结束（EOR）标志指示消息何时是系列中的最后一条，应被视为单个有效载荷。该功能已在Firefox 57中实现，但尚未在Chrome中实现（请参阅Chromium Bug 7774）。有了EOR支持， RTCDataChannel 的有效负载会更大（官方最高可达256kiB，但是Firefox的实现将其限制为高达1GiB）。即使在256kiB时，它的大小也足以在处理紧急流量时引起明显的延迟。如果您做得更大，除非您确定自己的运行状况，否则延迟可能变得难以忍受。

trans-unit.source: This works by creating an internal function, getEntries(), which calls itself recursively to get all the entries in the directory, concatenating each batch to the array. Each iteration, readEntries() is called to get more entries. When it returns an empty array, the end of the directory has beenr reached, and the recursion ends. Once control is returned to readDirectory(), the array is returned to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 这是通过创建一个内部函数 getEntries() 起作用的，该函数递归调用自身以获取目录中的所有条目，并将每个批次连接到数组。每次迭代都会调用 readEntries() 以获取更多条目。当它返回一个空数组时，到达目录的末尾，并且递归结束。一旦控件返回到 readDirectory() ，该数组将返回给调用方。

trans-unit.source: This works by obtaining the video element's stream from its srcObject property. Then the stream's track list is obtained by calling its getTracks() method. From there, all that remains to do is to iterate over the track list using forEach() and calling each track's stop() method.

trans-unit.source: Thus, it's important to note that the user agent never sends a merchantvalidation event, unless the user agent itself implements a payment handler. For instance, Safari has integrated support for Apple Pay, so the Apple Pay payment handler uses this to ensure that Apple Pay can be used to pay the merchant by sending merchantvalidation to the client, instructing it to fetch the server's validation data and deliver it to the payment handler by calling complete().
trans-unit.target: 因此，请务必注意，除非用户代理本身实现了付款处理程序，否则用户代理绝不会发送 merchantvalidation 事件。例如，Safari集成了对Apple Pay的支持，因此Apple Pay付款处理程序使用它来确保Apple Pay可用于通过向客户发送 merchantvalidation 验证，指示其获取服务器的验证数据并将其交付给客户端来向商家付款。通过调用 complete() 来付款处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Timeline objects provide the useful property currentTime, which lets us see how long the page has been opened for: it's the "current time" of the document's timeline, which started when the page was opened. As of this writing, there’s only one kind of timeline object: the one based on the active document’s timeline. In the future we may see timeline objects that correspond to the length of the page, perhaps a ScrollTimeline, or other things entirely.

trans-unit.target: 为了检查着色器是否已成功编译，请检查着色器参数 gl.COMPILE_STATUS 。要获取其值，我们调用 gl.getShaderParameter() ，指定着色器和我们要检查的参数的名称（ gl.COMPILE_STATUS ）。如果为 false ，则我们知道着色器编译失败，因此使用 gl.getShaderInfoLog() 从编译器获取日志信息时显示警报，然后删除着色器并返回 null ，指示加载着色器失败。

trans-unit.source: To close a connection either the client or server can send a control frame with data containing a specified control sequence to begin the closing handshake (detailed in Section 5.5.1). Upon receiving such a frame, the other peer sends a Close frame in response. The first peer then closes the connection. Any further data received after closing of connection is then discarded.
trans-unit.target: 为了关闭连接，客户端或服务器都可以发送一个控制帧，其中包含包含指定控制序列的数据，以开始关闭握手（在5.5.1节中进行了详细介绍）。在接收到这样的帧后，另一对等方作为响应发送关闭帧。然后，第一个对等方关闭连接。关闭连接后收到的任何其他数据将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: To close a connection either the client or server can send a control frame with data containing a specified control sequence to begin the closing handshake (detailed in Section 5.5.1). Upon receiving such a frame, the other peer sends a Close frame in response. The first peer then closes the connection. Any further data received after closing of connection is then discarded.

To comply with the specification, starting with Gecko 16.0 (Firefox 16.0 / Thunderbird 16.0 / SeaMonkey 2.13), a call with an invalid number of arguments (only 3 or 7 arguments are valid), will now throw an error (bug 762657).

trans-unit.source: To convert our sample media from a QuickTime MOV container to an MP4 container, we can use ffmpeg. Because the audio codec in the MOV container is already AAC and the video codec is h.264, we can instruct ffmpeg not to perform transcoding. Instead, it will just copy the audio and video tracks over without performing any transcoding, which is relatively faster than having to transcode.
trans-unit.target: 要将我们的样本媒体从QuickTime MOV容器转换为MP4容器,我们可以使用ffmpeg。因为MOV容器中的音频编解码器已经是AAC,视频编解码器是h.264,我们可以指示ffmpeg不执行转码。取而代之的是,它将只复制音频和视频轨道,而不执行任何转码,这比必须转码相对要快。

trans-unit.source: To create a WebGLShader use WebGLRenderingContext.createShader, then hook up the GLSL source code using WebGLRenderingContext.shaderSource(), and finally invoke WebGLRenderingContext.compileShader() to finish and compile the shader. At this point the WebGLShader is still not in a usable form and must still be attached to a WebGLProgram.
trans-unit.target: 要创建WebGLShader，请使用 WebGLRenderingContext.createShader ，然后使用 WebGLRenderingContext.shaderSource() 连接GLSL源代码，最后调用 WebGLRenderingContext.compileShader() 完成并编译着色器。此时，WebGLShader仍无法使用，并且仍必须附加到 WebGLProgram 上。

trans-unit.source: To demonstrate basic usage of the MediaRecorder API, we have built a web-based dictaphone. It allows you to record snippets of audio and then play them back. It even gives you a visualization of your device's sound input, using the Web Audio API. We'll concentrate on the recording and playback functionality for this article.

trans-unit.source: To demonstrate just the very basics of registering and installing a service worker, we have created a simple demo called sw-test, which is a simple Star wars Lego image gallery. It uses a promise-powered function to read image data from a JSON object and load the images using Ajax, before displaying the images in a line down the page. We’ve kept things static and simple for now. It also registers, installs, and activates a service worker, and when more of the spec is supported by browsers it will cache all the files required so it will work offline!
trans-unit.target: 为了演示注册和安装服务人员的基本知识，我们创建了一个名为sw-test的简单演示，它是一个简单的Star Wars Lego图像库。在页面下一行显示图像之前，它使用一个由promise驱动的函数从JSON对象读取图像数据并使用Ajax加载图像。我们暂时保持静态和简单。它还会注册，安装和激活服务工作者，并且当浏览器支持更多规范时，它将缓存所有需要的文件，因此可以脱机工作！

trans-unit.source: To determine if the add operation has completed successfully, listen for the results’s success event.

trans-unit.source: To determine if the add operation has completed successfully, listen for the transaction’s complete event in addition to the IDBObjectStore.add request’s success event, because the transaction may still fail after the success event fires. In other words, the success event is only triggered when the transaction has been successfully queued.
trans-unit.target: 要确定添加操作是否已成功 complete ，除了 IDBObjectStore.add 请求的 success 事件外，还要侦听事务的complete事件，因为在成功事件触发后，事务仍可能失败。换句话说，仅当事务已成功排队时才触发成功事件。

trans-unit.target: 要确定收发器支持哪些编解码器，请调用发送者的 getCapabilities() 和接收者的 getCapabilities() 方法，并从每个方法的结果中获取 codecs 列表。

trans-unit.source: To discourage the synchronous use of XMLHttpRequest, HTML support is not available in the synchronous mode. Also, HTML support is only available if the responseType property has been set to "document". This limitation avoids wasting time parsing HTML uselessly when legacy code uses XMLHttpRequest in the default mode to retrieve responseText for text/html resources. Also, this limitation avoids problems with legacy code that assumes that responseXML is null for HTTP error pages (which often have a text/html response body).
trans-unit.target: 为了阻止 XMLHttpRequest 的同步使用，在同步模式下不提供HTML支持。另外，仅当 responseType 属性设置为 "document" ，HTML支持才可用。当传统代码在默认模式下使用 XMLHttpRequest 来检索 text/html 资源的 responseText 时，此限制可避免浪费不必要的时间来解析HTML 。此外，此限制还避免了传统代码的问题，该代码假定HTTP错误页（通常具有 text/html 响应正文）的 responseXML 为 null 。

trans-unit.source: To display the ImageBitmap, you can use a ImageBitmapRenderingContext context, which can be created by calling canvas.getContext("bitmaprenderer") on a (visible) canvas element. This context only provides functionality to replace the canvas's contents with the given ImageBitmap. A call to ImageBitmapRenderingContext.transferFromImageBitmap() with the previously rendered and saved ImageBitmap from the OffscreenCanvas, will display the ImageBitmap on the canvas and transfer its ownership to the canvas. A single OffscreenCanvas may transfer frames into an arbitrary number of other ImageBitmapRenderingContext objects.
trans-unit.target: 要显示 ImageBitmap ，可以使用 ImageBitmapRenderingContext 上下文，可以通过在（可见）画布元素上调用 canvas.getContext("bitmaprenderer") 来创建该上下文。该上下文仅提供用给定的 ImageBitmap 替换画布内容的功能。从OffscreenCanvas 调用 ImageBitmapRenderingContext.transferFromImageBitmap() 并使用先前渲染并保存的 ImageBitmap ，将在画布上显示 ImageBitmap 并将其所有权转移到画布。单个 OffscreenCanvas 可以将帧传输到任意数量的其他 ImageBitmapRenderingContext 中 对象。

trans-unit.source: To do this, it's possible to add a tag to any new notification. If a notification already has the same tag and has not been displayed yet, the new notification replaces that previous notification. If the notification with the same tag has already been displayed, the previous notification is closed and the new one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 要做到这一点,可以为任何新通知添加一个标签。如果一个通知已经有相同的标签并且尚未显示,则新的通知将取代之前的通知。如果具有相同标签的通知已经显示,则关闭先前的通知并显示新的通知。

trans-unit.source: To drag multiple links, you can also separate each link with a linebreak. A line that begins with a number sign (#) is a comment and should not be considered a valid URL. You can use a comment to indicate the purpose of a link, or to hold the title associated with a link. The text/plain version of the drag data should include all links but should not include the comments.
trans-unit.target: 要拖动多个链接，您还可以使用换行符分隔每个链接。以数字符号（＃）开头的行是注释，不应被视为有效的URL。您可以使用注释来指示链接的目的，或保留与链接关联的标题。拖动数据的 text/plain 版本应包含所有链接，但不应包含注释。

trans-unit.source: To emulate this behavior in modern implementations, the presence of this member with a value false, will set the direction of all existing audio transceivers to exclude reception (i.e. set to either "sendonly" or "inactive").

trans-unit.target: 为了在现代实现中模拟此行为，该成员的值为 false 将设置所有现有视频收发器的方向以排除接收（即，设置为 "sendonly" 或 "inactive" ）。

trans-unit.source: To enqueue the task, we push an object onto the taskList array; the object contains the taskHandler and taskData values under the names handler and data, respectively, then increment totalTaskCount, which reflects the total number of tasks which have ever been enqueued (we don't decrement it when tasks are removed from the queue).
trans-unit.target: 为了使任务入队，我们将一个对象压入 taskList 数组。该对象分别在名称 handler 和 data 下包含 taskHandler 和 taskData 值，然后递增 totalTaskCount ，这反映了已排队的任务总数（当从队列中删除任务时，我们不会递减它）。

trans-unit.source: To explicitly trigger ICE restart, simply start the renegotiation process by calling RTCPeerConnection.createOffer(), specifying the iceRestart option with a value of true. Then handle the connection process from then on just like you normally would. This generates new values for the ICE username fragment (ufrag) and password, which will be used by the renegotiation process and the resulting connection.
trans-unit.target: 要显式触发ICE重新启动，只需调用 RTCPeerConnection.createOffer() 并指定 iceRestart 选项（值为 true ）来启动重新协商过程。然后像往常一样处理此后的连接过程。这将为ICE用户名片段（ufrag）和密码生成新值，这些值将由重新协商过程和所产生的连接使用。

trans-unit.source: To fix this, you have to be very precise in your path creation. Knowing that a 1.0 width line will extend half a unit to either side of the path, creating the path from (3.5,1) to (3.5,5) results in the situation in the third image—the 1.0 line width ends up completely and precisely filling a single pixel vertical line.
trans-unit.target: 要解决此问题，必须非常精确地创建路径。知道 1.0 宽度的线将向路径的任一侧延伸一半，因此创建从（3.5,1）到（3.5,5）的路径会导致出现第三张图片中的情况 1.0 线的宽度完全终止，精确填充单个像素的垂直线。

trans-unit.source: To get the blend color, query the BLEND_COLOR constant which returns a Float32Array.

trans-unit.source: To get the blend equations, query the BLEND_EQUATION, BLEND_EQUATION_RGB and BLEND_EQUATION_ALPHA constants which return gl.FUNC_ADD, gl.FUNC_SUBTRACT, gl.FUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACT, or if the EXT_blend_minmax is enabled: ext.MIN_EXT or ext.MAX_EXT.

trans-unit.source: To get the current blend equations, query the BLEND_EQUATION, BLEND_EQUATION_RGB and BLEND_EQUATION_ALPHA constants which return gl.FUNC_ADD, gl.FUNC_SUBTRACT, gl.FUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACT, or if the EXT_blend_minmax is enabled: ext.MIN_EXT or ext.MAX_EXT.
trans-unit.target: 为了获得当前混合式，查询 BLEND_EQUATION ， BLEND_EQUATION_RGB 和 BLEND_EQUATION_ALPHA 常数，其返回 gl.FUNC_ADD ， gl.FUNC_SUBTRACT ， gl.FUNC_REVERSE_SUBTRACT ，或者如果 EXT_blend_minmax 启用： ext.MIN_EXT 或 ext.MAX_EXT 。

trans-unit.source: To get your started, we have published a couple of demos on Github. First up, check out our channel messaging basic demo (run it live too), which shows a really simple single message transfer between a page and an embedded <iframe>.

trans-unit.source: To grab a lock only if it isn't already being held, use the ifAvailable option. In this function await means the method will not return until the callback is complete. Since the lock is only granted if it was available, this call avoids waiting on the lock being release elsehwere.
trans-unit.target: 要仅在尚未持有的情况下抓住锁，请使用 ifAvailable 选项。在此函数中， await 表示该方法在回调完成之前不会返回。由于仅当锁可用时才授予该锁，因此此调用避免了等待释放该锁。

trans-unit.source: To grab the media stream we want to capture, we use getUserMedia(). We then use the MediaRecorder API to record the stream, and output each recorded snippet into the source of a generated <audio> element so it can be played back.
trans-unit.target: 要获取要捕获的媒体流，请使用 getUserMedia() 。然后，我们使用MediaRecorder API记录流，并将每个记录的片段输出到生成的 <audio> 元素的源中，以便对其进行播放。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee enough performance, implementations are not using a truly random number generator, but they are using a pseudo-random number generator seeded with a value with enough entropy. The PRNG used differs from one implementation to the other but is suitable for cryptographic usages. Implementations are also required to use a seed with enough entropy, like a system-level entropy source.
trans-unit.target: 为了保证足够的性能，实现不使用真正的随机数生成器，而是使用伪随机数生成器，该伪随机数生成器填充有具有足够熵的值。所使用的PRNG不同于一种实现，但适用于密码用法。还需要实现，以使用具有足够熵的种子，例如系统级熵源。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the user's current location, you can call the getCurrentPosition() method. This initiates an asynchronous request to detect the user's position, and queries the positioning hardware to get up-to-date information. When the position is determined, the defined callback function is executed. You can optionally provide a second callback function to be executed if an error occurs. A third, optional, parameter is an options object where you can set the maximum age of the position returned, the time to wait for a request, and if you want high accuracy for the position.
trans-unit.target: 要获取用户的当前位置，可以调用 getCurrentPosition() 方法。这将启动一个异步请求以检测用户的位置，并查询定位硬件以获取最新信息。确定位置后，将执行定义的回调函数。如果发生错误，您可以选择提供第二个回调函数来执行。第三个可选参数是一个选项对象，您可以在其中设置返回的头寸的最长使用期限，等待请求的时间，以及是否需要该头寸的高精度。

trans-unit.source: To pause the timers, all we need to do is remove the ads from the set of visible ads (visibleAds) and mark them as inactive. To do so, we begin by saving the set of visible ads into a variable known as previouslyVisibleAds to be sure we can restore them when the user tabs back into the document, and we then empty the visibleAds set so they won't be treated as visible. Then, for each of the ads that are being suspended, we call our updateAdTimer() function, which handles updating the ad's total visible time counter, then we set their dataset.lastViewStarted property to 0, which indicates that the tab's timer isn't running.
trans-unit.target: 要暂停计时器，我们需要做的就是从可见广告（ visibleAds ）中删除广告并将其标记为无效。为此，我们首先将可见广告集保存到一个名为 previouslyVisibleAds 的变量中，以确保我们可以在用户跳回到文档中时将其还原，然后清空 visibleAds 集，以免将其视为可见。然后，对于每个被暂停的广告，我们调用我们的 updateAdTimer() 函数，该函数处理更新广告的总可见时间计数器，然后将其数据集 dataset.lastViewStarted 属性设置为0，这表示该标签的计时器未设置运行。

trans-unit.source: To populate the <select> element with the different voice options the device has available, we've written a populateVoiceList() function. We first invoke SpeechSynthesis.getVoices(), which returns a list of all the available voices, represented by SpeechSynthesisVoice objects. We then loop through this list — for each voice we create an <option> element, set its text content to display the name of the voice (grabbed from SpeechSynthesisVoice.name), the language of the voice (grabbed from SpeechSynthesisVoice.lang), and -- DEFAULT if the voice is the default voice for the synthesis engine (checked by seeing if SpeechSynthesisVoice.default returns true.)
trans-unit.target: 为了用设备可用的不同语音选项填充 <select> 元素，我们编写了 populateVoiceList() 函数。我们首先调用 SpeechSynthesis.getVoices() ，该函数返回由 SpeechSynthesisVoice 对象表示的所有可用语音的列表。然后，我们遍历此列表-为每个语音创建一个 <option> 元素，设置其文本内容以显示语音名称（从 SpeechSynthesisVoice.name 夺取），语音语言（从 SpeechSynthesisVoice.lang 夺取），和 -- DEFAULT 如果声音是合成引擎的默认声音，则为默认值（通过查看是否 SpeechSynthesisVoice.default 返回 true 。）

trans-unit.source: To prevent this problem, some browsers (specifically, Chrome and Firefox) have changed the default value of the passive option to true for the touchstart and touchmove events on the document-level nodes Window, Document, and Document.body. This prevents the event listener from being called, so it can't block page rendering while the user is scrolling.

trans-unit.source: To read the records of an existing object store, the transaction can either be in readonly or readwrite mode. To make changes to an existing object store, the transaction must be in readwrite mode. You open such transactions with IDBDatabase.transaction. The method accepts two parameters: the storeNames (the scope, defined as an array of object stores that you want to access) and the mode (readonly or readwrite) for the transaction. The method returns a transaction object containing the IDBIndex.objectStore method, which you can use to access your object store. By default, where no mode is specified, transactions open in readonly mode.
trans-unit.target: 要读取现有对象存储的记录，事务可以处于 readonly 或 readwrite 模式。要更改现有的对象存储，事务必须处于 readwrite 模式。您可以使用 IDBDatabase.transaction 打开此类事务。该方法接受两个参数： storeNames （范围，定义为要访问的对象存储的数组）和事务的 mode （ readonly 或 readwrite ）。该方法返回一个包含 IDBIndex.objectStore 的事务对象方法，可用于访问对象存储。默认情况下，如果未指定任何模式，则事务以 readonly 模式打开。

trans-unit.source: To solve this problem, analytics and diagnostics code have historically made a synchronous XMLHttpRequest call in an unload or beforeunload event handler to submit the data. The synchronous XMLHttpRequest blocks the process of unloading the document, which in turn causes the next navigation appear to be slower. There is nothing the next page can do to avoid this perception of poor page load performance, and the result is that the user perceives that the new web page is slow to load, even though the true issue is with the previous page.
trans-unit.target: 为了解决此问题，分析和诊断代码历来在 unload 或 beforeunload 事件处理程序中进行了同步 XMLHttpRequest 调用，以提交数据。同步的 XMLHttpRequest 阻止了文档的卸载过程，这反过来又导致下一次导航显得更慢。下一页无法采取任何措施来避免这种糟糕的页面加载性能的感觉，结果是即使前一页的真正问题是用户也认为新网页的加载速度很慢。

We create this offer by calling myPeerConnection.createOffer().

trans-unit.source: To use backpressure in a ReadableStream, we can ask the controller for the chunk size desired by the consumer by querying the ReadableStreamDefaultController.desiredSize attribute on the controller. If it is too low, our ReadableStream can tell its underlying source to stop sending data, and we backpressure along the stream chain.

trans-unit.source: Today, most Web content is designed for keyboard and mouse input. However, devices with touch screens (especially portable devices) are mainstream and Web applications can either directly process touch-based input by using Touch Events or the application can use interpreted mouse events for the application input. A disadvantage to using mouse events is that they do not support concurrent user input, whereas touch events support multiple simultaneous inputs (possibly at different locations on the touch surface), thus enhancing user experiences.
trans-unit.target: 如今，大多数Web内容都是为键盘和鼠标输入而设计的。但是，带触摸屏的设备（尤其是便携式设备）是主流，Web应用程序可以使用“ Touch Events 直接处理基于触摸的输入，或者应用程序可以将解释后的鼠标事件用于应用程序输入。使用鼠标事件的一个缺点是它们不支持并发用户输入，而触摸事件则支持多个同时输入（可能在触摸表面上的不同位置），从而增强了用户体验。

trans-unit.source: Together, these interfaces define a relatively low-level set of features, yet they support many kinds of touch-based interaction, including the familiar multi-touch gestures such as multi-finger swipe, rotation, pinch and zoom.
trans-unit.target: 这些界面共同定义了一套相对较低级的功能,但它们却支持多种基于触摸的交互,包括我们熟悉的多点触摸手势,如多指滑动、旋转、捏合和缩放。

trans-unit.source: Touch events are similar to mouse events except they support simultaneous touches and at different locations on the touch surface. The TouchEvent interface encapsulates all of the touch points that are currently active. The Touch interface, which represents a single touch point, includes information such as the position of the touch point relative to the browser viewport.
trans-unit.target: 触摸事件与鼠标事件类似，不同之处在于它们支持同时触摸并且在触摸表面的不同位置上。该 TouchEvent 接口封装了所有当前活动的触摸点。代表单个触摸点的 Touch 界面包含诸如触摸点相对于浏览器视口的位置之类的信息。

trans-unit.source: Touch events consist of three interfaces (Touch, TouchEvent and TouchList) and the following event types:
trans-unit.target: 触摸事件包括三个界面（ Touch ， TouchEvent 和 TouchList ）以及以下事件类型：

trans-unit.source: Tracks whose kind is "chapters" are used by the user agent or the Web site or Web app to construct and present an interface for navigating the named chapters, where each cue in the list represents a chapter in the media. The user can then navigate to the desired chapter, which begins at the cue's start position and ends at the cue's end position.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理或网站或Web应用程序使用 kind 为 "chapters" 轨道来构造和显示用于导航命名章节的界面，其中列表中的每个提示代表媒体中的章节。然后，用户可以导航到所需的章节，该章节从提示的开始位置开始，到提示的结束位置结束。

trans-unit.source: Traditionally, a web page has to send a request to the server to receive new data; that is, the page requests data from the server. With server-sent events, it's possible for a server to send new data to a web page at any time, by pushing messages to the web page. These incoming messages can be treated as Events + data inside the web page.
trans-unit.target: 传统上，网页必须向服务器发送请求以接收新数据。也就是说，页面从服务器请求数据。使用服务器发送的事件，服务器可以通过将消息推送到网页来随时将新数据发送到网页。这些传入消息可被视为网页内的事件 +数据。

trans-unit.source: Transactions are expected to be short-lived, so the browser can terminate a transaction that takes too long, in order to free up storage resources that the long-running transaction has locked. You can abort the transaction, which rolls back the changes made to the database in the transaction. And you don't even have to wait for the transaction to start or be active to abort it.
trans-unit.target: 事务预计是短暂的,所以浏览器可以终止时间过长的事务,以释放长期运行的事务所锁定的存储资源。你可以中止事务,这将回滚事务中对数据库所做的更改。而且你甚至不需要等待事务开始或活跃就可以中止事务。

trans-unit.source: Transactions can fail for a fixed number of reasons, all of which (except the user agent crash) will trigger an abort callback:
trans-unit.target: 交易可能因为固定的原因而失败,所有这些原因(除了用户代理崩溃)都会触发一个中止回调。

trans-unit.source: Transactions can have one of three modes:
trans-unit.target: 交易可以有三种模式之一。

trans-unit.source: Transactions can receive DOM events of three different types: error, abort, and complete. We've talked about the way that error events bubble, so a transaction receives error events from any requests that are generated from it. A more subtle point here is that the default behavior of an error is to abort the transaction in which it occurred. Unless you handle the error by first calling stopPropagation() on the error event then doing something else, the entire transaction is rolled back. This design forces you to think about and handle errors, but you can always add a catchall error handler to the database if fine-grained error handling is too cumbersome. If you don't handle an error event or if you call abort() on the transaction, then the transaction is rolled back and an abort event is fired on the transaction. Otherwise, after all pending requests have completed, you'll get a complete event. If you're doing lots of database operations, then tracking the transaction rather than individual requests can certainly aid your sanity.
trans-unit.target: 事务可以接收三种不同类型的DOM事件： error ， abort 和 complete 。我们已经讨论了 error 事件冒泡的方式，因此事务从该错误事件生成的任何请求中接收错误事件。这里更微妙的一点是，错误的默认行为是中止发生错误的事务。除非您通过首先在错误事件上调用 stopPropagation() 来处理错误，然后再执行其他操作，否则整个事务都会回滚。这种设计迫使您考虑并处理错误，但是如果细粒度的错误处理过于繁琐，则始终可以向数据库添加一个包罗万象的错误处理程序。如果您不处理错误事件或致电 abort() 事务上的abort（），然后回滚该事务，并在该事务上引发 abort 事件。否则，在所有待处理的请求完成后，您将获得一个 complete 事件。如果您要执行大量数据库操作，那么跟踪事务而不是单个请求肯定可以帮助您理智。

trans-unit.source: Two peers need to exchange ICE candidates to negotiate the actual connection between them. Every ICE candidate describes a method that the sending peer is able to use to communicate. Each peer sends candidates in the order they're discovered, and keeps sending candidates until it runs out of suggestions, even if media has already started streaming.
trans-unit.target: 两个对等体需要交换ICE候选者来协商它们之间的实际连接。每个ICE候选者都描述了发送对等体能够用来通信的方法。每个对等体按照被发现的顺序发送候选者,并不断发送候选者,直到用完建议,即使媒体已经开始流媒体。

trans-unit.source: Typically a user can press the tab key to move the focus around the page among focusable elements, and use the space bar to activate one (that is, to press a button or toggle a radio button). Which elements are focusable varies depending on the platform and the browser's current configuration. For example, on macOS systems, elements that aren't text input elements are not typically focusable by default.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,用户可以按tab键在页面中的焦点元素中移动焦点,并使用空格键激活一个元素(即按下按钮或切换单选按钮)。哪些元素是可聚焦的,根据平台和浏览器的当前配置而有所不同。例如,在macOS系统上,不是文本输入元素的元素通常默认为不可聚焦。

trans-unit.source: Typically you will use this by calling show(), then entering a loop or recursive function that checks the PaymentResponse for errors or other reasons to retry the payment request. If a retry is needed, the loop calls retry(), then loops back to check the response when it comes in. The loop exits only when the user either cancels the payment request or the request is successful.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您将通过调用 show() 来使用此功能，然后输入一个循环或递归函数来检查 PaymentResponse 是否存在错误或其他原因以重试付款请求。如果需要重试，则循环调用 retry() ，然后循环返回以检查响应是否到来。仅当用户取消付款请求或请求成功时，循环才会退出。

trans-unit.source: Typically, offsetHeight is a measurement in pixels of the element's CSS height, including any borders, padding, and horizontal scrollbars (if rendered). It does not include the height of pseudo-elements such as ::before or ::after. For the document body object, the measurement includes total linear content height instead of the element's CSS height. Floated elements extending below other linear content are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 通常， offsetHeight 以像素为单位的CSS高度的度量，包括任何边框，内边距和水平滚动条（如果呈现）。它不包括伪元素的高度，例如 ::before 或 ::after 。对于文档主体对象，该度量包括总线性内容高度而不是元素的CSS高度。延伸到其他线性内容以下的浮动元素将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Typically, offsetWidth is a measurement in pixels of the element's CSS width, including any borders, padding, and vertical scrollbars (if rendered). It does not include the width of pseudo-elements such as ::before or ::after.
trans-unit.target: 通常， offsetWidth 是元素CSS宽度的度量单位，包括任何边框，填充和垂直滚动条（如果呈现）。它不包括伪元素的宽度，例如 ::before 或 ::after 。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a z value of 0 represents the plane of the screen. As the value increases, the point moves outward from the screen toward the user. As the value decreases, the point moves farther from the user, with negative values being behind the screen, receding into the distance.
trans-unit.target: 通常， z 值为0表示屏幕的平面。随着值的增加，该点从屏幕向外移向用户。随着该值减小，该点将远离用户，而负值位于屏幕后面，并退回到该距离。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an application may want to perform some cleanup by deleting the file drag data. In this example, the drop event is passed along from drop handler to a custom function called removeDragData. If the browser supports the DataTransferItemList interface, the list's clear() method is used to delete the file drag data; otherwise the DataTransfer object's clearData() method is used to delete the data.
trans-unit.target: 通常，应用程序可能希望通过删除文件拖动数据来执行一些清理。在此示例中，drop事件从drop handler传递到名为removeDragData的自定义函数。如果浏览器支持 DataTransferItemList 接口，则使用列表的 clear() 方法删除文件拖动数据。否则，使用 DataTransfer 对象的 clearData() 方法删除数据。

trans-unit.target: 通常，应用程序将在放置目标元素上包含一个 dragover 事件处理程序，并且该处理程序将关闭浏览器的默认拖动行为。要添加此处理程序，您需要包括一个 ondragover 全局事件处理程序：

trans-unit.source: Typically, you'll want to call beginPath() for each new thing you want to stroke. If you don't, the previous sub-paths will remain part of the current path, and get stroked every time you call the stroke() method. In some cases, however, this may be the desired effect.

UndoManager and DOMTransaction
The definition of 'Element' in that specification.
trans-unit.target:
UndoManager和DOMTransaction
该规范中“元素”的定义。

trans-unit.source: Undoes the last executed command.
trans-unit.target: 撤销上次执行的命令。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, WebRTC can’t create connections without some sort of server in the middle. We call this the signal channel or signaling service. It’s any sort of channel of communication to exchange information before setting up a connection, whether by email, post card or a carrier pigeon... it’s up to you.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，WebRTC无法在中间没有某种服务器的情况下创建连接。我们称其为信号通道或信令服务。建立连接之前，可以通过任何形式的交流渠道交换信息，无论是通过电子邮件，明信片还是邮递员鸽……这取决于您。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, the only way to tell ICE that the server has a backup domain name of stunserver2.example.org is to add a new entry to the iceServers array for it. The urls property lets you include them both in one server, which is more readily maintainable.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，告诉ICE服务器备份域名为 stunserver2.example.org 的唯一方法是为其添加一个新条目到 iceServers 阵列中。该 urls 属性，可以包括他们两人在一台服务器，这是更容易维护。

trans-unit.source: Unicode strings
trans-unit.target: 统一码字符串

trans-unit.source: Uniform blocks: one entry for each member. If the uniform block has an instance name, the block name is prefixed. E.g. uniform Block { float foo; }; will result in foo, and uniform Block { float bar; } e; will result in Block.bar.
trans-unit.target: 统一块：每个成员一个条目。如果统一块具有实例名称，则该块名称带有前缀。例如， uniform Block { float foo; }; 将导致 foo 和 uniform Block { float bar; } e; 将导致 Block.bar 。
